Pointer.String: Like a dream I once saw,•it passes by as it touches my cheek.
This street leading to the ocean•carries the smell of sea.
Before love makes me tell a white lie.
This loneliness=@•I want you to hold it in your arms now.
If you will always be by my side,
there'll be no sorrow or tears in my eyes.
Can't live without you.•Why did you have to decide?
You won't be aware of my pains and lies.
Don't leave me alone, stay with me.
I don't know if you'll ever look back.
I'll remember you forever.
